fact.description: The match has started at Mineirao Stadium.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Throw-in for Brazil close to the penalty box.
Brazil's Marcelo misses with an attempt on goal.
Marco Rodriguez awards Germany a goal kick.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Germany throw-in in Brazil's half.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Germany to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Throw-in Brazil.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte, Sami Khedira of Germany is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Great play from Toni Kroos to set up the goal.
Goal kick for Germany at Mineirao Stadium.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Throw-in for Germany at Mineirao Stadium.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Brazil in their own half.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Germany throw-in in Brazil's half.
Germany have a dangerous throw-in.
Germany's Miroslav Klose gets in a shot on goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Miroslav Klose of Germany smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Germany take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Miroslav Klose.
That's a fine assist from Philipp Lahm.
Sami Khedira instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Germany needs to be cautious. Brazil have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Germany awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Mesut Ozil with an assist there.
Throw-in for Germany at Mineirao Stadium.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Free kick Germany.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
Brazil have a goal kick.
Brazil's Hulk has run offside.
Marco Rodriguez signals a throw-in for Germany, close to Brazil's area.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Germany's Mesut Ozil breaks free at Mineirao Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marco Rodriguez awards Brazil a goal kick.
Throw-in Brazil.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Brazil is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brazil push forward at Mineirao Stadium and Oscar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Germany defence.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Germany throw-in in Brazil's half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Brazil.
Throw-in for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Goal kick for Germany at Mineirao Stadium.
Marco Rodriguez blows to end the first-half.
Free kick Brazil.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the first half.
Brazil make their first substitution with Paulinho replacing Fernandinho.
Luiz Felipe Scolari (Brazil) is making a second substitution, with Ramires replacing Hulk.
Per Mertesacker is on a sub for Mats Hummels for Germany.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Brazil to take a throw-in in Germany territory.
Ramires (Brazil) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Oscar for Brazil drives towards goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
In Belo Horizonte Brazil drive forward through Paulinho. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany.
Brazil awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Germany.
Free kick Brazil.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Throw-in for Brazil in their own half.
Andre Schurrle is on a sub for Miroslav Klose for Germany.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Brazil.
Brazil's Fred is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Germany drive forward and Thomas Muller gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Germany have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Corner awarded to Brazil.
Can Brazil get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Germany's half?
Free kick Brazil.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Brazil throw-in in Germany's half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany.
Brazil's Dante has been booked in Belo Horizonte.
That's a fine assist from Philipp Lahm.
Willian is replacing Fred for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Throw-in for Germany in their own half.
Willian of Brazil gets in a strike, but is off target.
Germany have a goal kick.
Marco Rodriguez awards Brazil a goal kick.
Paulinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Brazil.
Throw-in Brazil.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Germany make their third substitution with Julian Draxler replacing Sami Khedira.
Marco Rodriguez signals a free kick to Germany in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez signals a Germany throw-in in Brazil's half.
Germany to take a throw-in in Brazil territory.
Thomas Muller with an assist there.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
In Belo Horizonte Brazil attack through Marcelo. The finish is off target, however.
Germany have a goal kick.
Can Germany get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brazil's half?
In Belo Horizonte Brazil drive forward through Ramires. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Ball goes out of play for a Germany goal kick.
Corner awarded to Germany.
Ball safe as Germany is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Brazil's Oscar gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Brazil are coming forward and Bernard gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Germany at Mineirao Stadium.
Ramires (Brazil) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Mesut Ozil for Germany gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Brazil at Mineirao Stadium.
Great play from David Luiz to set up the goal.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the second half.
Brazil's David Luiz gets in a shot on goal at Mineirao Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Brazil have been awarded a corner by Marco Rodriguez.
Brazil awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Rodriguez blows to end the match. The final score is 1-7.
